chapters.title: Chapter 9: A Pair of Silverpike
chapters.info: Faolain Orande, p. 169 (206)—Dark, curly-haired Accepted. She has an extreme dislike for Wilders, and did not treat Siuan and Leane very well when they were stilled, either. She spent eight years as a novice, and five among the Accepted. She has since been raised to Aes Sedai by Egwene, and has been accepted into the Blue Ajah.
